DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria `` aspirin '' group : take aspirin , nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAIDs ) , clopidogrel previous 10 day history myocardial infarction , ischemic stroke , ischemic event Inclusion Criteria `` aspirin daily '' group : take aspirin daily last 10 day history myocardial infarction , ischemic stroke , ischemic event Inclusion Criteria `` new aspirin '' group : previously prescribe aspirin , prescribe aspirin present appointment , e.g . high calcium plaque score CT history myocardial infarction , ischemic stroke , ischemic event know bleed thrombotic disorder Exclusion Criteria `` new aspirin '' group : know bleed thrombotic disorder take aspirin , NSAIDs , clopidogrel , anticoagulant previous 10 day
